cs.eng1.piazzapanic.utility.saving

Package

cs.eng1.piazzapanic

cs.eng1.piazzapanic.screens
 
cs.eng1.piazzapanic.utility.saving
 
  • Classes in cs.eng1.piazzapanic.utility.saving used by cs.eng1.piazzapanic
    Class
    Description
    SavedPlayerState
    SavedPlayerState stores the relevant values of PlayerState so that it can be saved as part of a json file SavedPlayerState stores the player's cash, selected difficulty, their power up timers and their progress in purchasing stations and hiring chefs
    SaveState
    SaveState stores all other types of Saved classes and serves to hold the json values read and written to file
  • Classes in cs.eng1.piazzapanic.utility.saving used by cs.eng1.piazzapanic.chef
    Class
    Description
    SavedChefManager
    SavedChefManager stores the relevant values for saving the ChefManager class as a json SavedChefManager stores an array of SavedChefs, which is the currently available chefs
  • Classes in cs.eng1.piazzapanic.utility.saving used by cs.eng1.piazzapanic.customer
    Class
    Description
    SavedCustomer
    SavedCustomer stores the values of a Customer relevant for saving in a manner that can be stored as a json SavedCustomer stores the customer's position, whether they have deducted rep or had their order already, their time until they deduct rep, their order, their image and their current destination
    SavedCustomerManager
    SavedCustomerManager stores the values of a CustomerManager relevant for saving in a manner that can be stored as a json SavedCustomerManager stores the max customers (0 in endless), how many have been spawned so far, the player's reputation, the timers for spawning and reducing spawn timer in endless, the availability of customer position objectives and the customers themselves
  • Classes in cs.eng1.piazzapanic.utility.saving used by cs.eng1.piazzapanic.screens
    Class
    Description
    SaveState
    SaveState stores all other types of Saved classes and serves to hold the json values read and written to file
  • Classes in cs.eng1.piazzapanic.utility.saving used by cs.eng1.piazzapanic.utility.saving
    Class
    Description
    SavedChef
    SavedChef stores the values of a Chef that are relevant for saving in a manner that can be serialized over for the json file creation.-0.84147096f SavedChef manager stores a chef's position, inventory, texture, inputEnabled and whether they are the currently active chef
    SavedChefManager
    SavedChefManager stores the relevant values for saving the ChefManager class as a json SavedChefManager stores an array of SavedChefs, which is the currently available chefs
    SavedCustomer
    SavedCustomer stores the values of a Customer relevant for saving in a manner that can be stored as a json SavedCustomer stores the customer's position, whether they have deducted rep or had their order already, their time until they deduct rep, their order, their image and their current destination
    SavedCustomerManager
    SavedCustomerManager stores the values of a CustomerManager relevant for saving in a manner that can be stored as a json SavedCustomerManager stores the max customers (0 in endless), how many have been spawned so far, the player's reputation, the timers for spawning and reducing spawn timer in endless, the availability of customer position objectives and the customers themselves
    SavedFood
    SavedFood stores the values of an instance of food, ingredient or recipe, relevant for saving in a manner that can be stored as a json SavedFood stores the name of the food, along with whether it is useable, completed and half completed (for grillable and cookable)
    SavedIngredientStack
    SavedIngredientStack saves the values of IngredientStack in a way that means they can be serialized over for the purposes of saving to a json file
    SavedPlayerState
    SavedPlayerState stores the relevant values of PlayerState so that it can be saved as part of a json file SavedPlayerState stores the player's cash, selected difficulty, their power up timers and their progress in purchasing stations and hiring chefs
    SavedStation
    SavedStation stores the values of an instance of a station relevant for saving in a manner that can be stored as a json SavedStation stores the station ID and its type, whether it is locked or in use and the food stored in that station
    SaveManager
    SaveManager is a singleton class that is used to perform saving and loading All of cs.eng1.piazzapanic.utility.saving was created for assesment 2;
    SaveState
    SaveState stores all other types of Saved classes and serves to hold the json values read and written to file
    SerializableMap
    A simple container for a Map<K,V> that stores the values as arrays for serialisation.
